column1: 0238|twenty-two minutes to three|It was true that the striking apparatus had long ago failed to agree with the hands; and the hands themselves
column2: owing tot he accumulated inaccuracies of years
column3: no longer denoted the real time; nevertheless
column4: whenever it struck seven he could always be sure that the hands were pointing to a quarter-past twelve
column5: and it was then just twenty-two minutes to three.
